Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Ole London Hotel in Macau, you'll be in the historical district and minutes from Sir Robert Ho Tung Library and Senado Square. This hotel is close to Ruins of St. Paul's Cathedral and Fortaleza do Monte.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 60 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary bottled water, as well as phones with free local calls.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Continental breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary bottled water, as well as phones with free local calls.

With a stay at Ole London Hotel in Macau, you'll be in the historical district and minutes from Sir Robert Ho Tung Library and Senado Square. This hotel is close to Ruins of St. Paul's Cathedral and Fortaleza do Monte.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sir Robert Ho Tung Library - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Yuet Tung Ferry Terminal - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
St. Augustine's Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
St. Joseph's Seminary and Church - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Dom Pedro V Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St. Augustine's Church - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Senado Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Leal Senado - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St. Lawrence's Church - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Holy House of Mercy - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
St. Dominic's Church - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Macau Legislative Assembly Building - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Superior Court of Macau Building - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Macau Government Headquarters - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Macau Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Ole London Hotel is Macau (MFM-Macau Intl.) - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
